dt-example.title: Uniqueness Threshold
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows how the definition of the `-init searchPanes.threshold` config option allows the user to define the level of uniqueness for a pane to be displayed.
The ratio of uniqueness is the number of different values throughout the table divided by the total number of values.
Thresholds can also be set for individual columns using the `-init columns.searchPanes.threshold` option. Here we set the threshold of the firstname column to be 0.99.
The default of `threshold` is 0.6.
